review: I've had the Fire Stick for a few months. I got it so I could get rid of cable TV. It doesn't work more often than it does work. Either it all of a sudden won't find my WiFi even though all other wireless devices are fine or I will be watching something and get an "unauthorized" message. I'm very unsatisfied with this particular product.

review: I love this. I have Apple TV and Fire TV and I use both equally. The biggest flaw with Apple TV is that it doesn't have Amazon Prime, which is why I purchased this. Both have very similar apps. Probably could have done without the Apple TV except that Apple TV seems to do better with streaming Netflix. I had some audio sync issues using Netflix on Fire TV so I'm glad I have both.
